Hi there!  Please help!  I'm trying to buy a gift for a KSP avid fan and wasn't sure what would be compatible.  Anyone using a joystick or other hardware to fly like an real pilot?

Any suggestions?

Thanks!

Stacy

I've not heard of any joysticks not working, based on their model.  I guess whichever one you like best.

 

Are you running on Linux by chance?
I'm not sure what he is running on.  Is there a joystick that you have used that you know is compatible with KSP?  Thanks!
